name: DSC Laravel Template
description: This awesome Laravel Progressive Web App was created for Developer Student Clubs in Sub Saharan Africa as a profile and a platform to showcase what they're upto in events, outreach to local businesses and showcases, maintain their community and most importantly their success stories to the world

APP_NAME.description: Your App Name. E.g DSC Ekiti State University

APP_NICK.description: Your App Nick. E.g DSC EKSU

SCHOOL_NAME.description: Your School Name. E.g DSC EKSU

APP_ENV.description: Your App Environment. E.g local or production

APP_KEY.description: Run php artisan key:generate to get app key

APP_URL.description: This will be the URL generated from Heroku which is https://<appname>.herokuapp.com. E.g https://dsceksu.herokuapp.com
